thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Incredible value
thread.title_full: Incredible value - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MMW30005
title: Incredible value
text:
This hotel exceeded our expectations at every turn. The service was five star. They not only responded efficiently and positively to every request but they offered to,do things we did not even request. For example, we did not ask for them to arrange for a taxi, but when we exited the train, a little overwhelmed as always when dropped into a new place, the first thing we saw was a taxi sent specifically for us by the hotel.
The beds were comfortable, the linens were nice and the bathroom was the largest I've ever had in Europe and it was very clean and modern.
This hotel exceeded our expectations at every turn and was a tremendous value.
